scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker volume rm bygagoos-ink_postgres_data
scripts.docker:exec-db: docker exec -it bygagoos-postgres psql -U postgres -d bygagoos_ink
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.db:backup: docker exec -t bygagoos-postgres pg_dump -U postgres -d bygagoos_ink > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i bygagoos-postgres psql -U postgres -d bygagoos_ink < backup.sql
scripts.db:console: docker exec -it bygagoos-postgres psql -U postgres -d bygagoos_ink
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format:all: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
scripts.deploy:setup: echo 'ðŸ“š Voir DEPLOYMENT_READY.md pour les instructions Vercel'
scripts.deploy:vercel: cd backend && npm run deploy:vercel && cd ../frontend && npm run deploy:vercel
scripts.health:frontend: curl http://localhost:5173 || echo 'Frontend accessible via navigateur'
scripts.health:all: npm run health:backend && npm run health:frontend
